description: Try our easy to follow Chargrilled Ocean Trout with Wasabi Mayonnaise recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fish dishes,Quick & easy dinner,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free
name: Chargrilled Ocean Trout with Wasabi Mayonnaise Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Lay ocean trout fillets into a shallow glass dish. Whisk teriyaki sauce with ginger and five spice powder and pour over fish. Allow to marinate for 10 minutes.
Meanwhile, mix mayonnaise, wasabi and coriander together in a small bowl. Wash salad leaves and arrange onto plates.

Heat oil in a non-stick frying pan or chargrill over medium-high heat. Drain marinade from fish and discard. Cook fish for 2-3 minutes each side, depending on thickness of the fish. Serve fish with salad and top with a dollop of wasabi mayonnaise.
